case.state: Look at this little princess. I bet she's a total bitch.
Oh? Is this a real goddess?
Yes, I'm Kazuma.
What's she doing here? Shoo! Go away!
I DON'T WANNA GO TO JAIL!
What is this absolutely sinister aura? Is one of the Demon King's elite around here?
Kizuna AI-chan? I get to play with such a big name?
I think I died and went to heaven.
Wow, that warp ticket I got from that succubus sent me here.
Let's get started! Wait, is that a car? No thanks! Cars and me don't mix!
You absolute bastard! I'll never forgive you! I'm gonna drive my fist through that smug face of yours!
Oh I'm gonna enjoy humbling you.
Great curves, long hair, skimpy outfit? Yep, she's a real goddess alright.
An amazon? Let's hope she's not the man-kidnapping kind.
Long story short, I saved a succubus and she gave me an item called a warp ticket that sent me here.
Give me your best cards!
Just gimme some cards...
Hey! Can I get ~cards~ over here?
How about giving me ~cards~, dealer?
Could you give me ~cards~, I guess?
I'd like ~cards~.
Ha! I need ~cards~!
Yes, I'm Kazuma.
Yeah, I'm gonna need some new cards!
I guess I could use some new cards.
I can't possibly lose!
Everyone else can suck it.
Looks like I'll get to someone strip this turn.
Good thing my luck skill is so high.
Nobody can beat my luck.
You'll never even have a chance to defeat me!
A hand worthy of this wonderful world!
God's blessing is on this wonderful hand.
I can win with these. No sweat.
Oh. These aren't as bad as I expected.
Looks like I win this round!
Thanks, dealer. I'll win this round for sure.
Easy win. No sweat.
The only way I'd win easier is if we played rock-paper-scissors.
I think I'm still in this!
Thanks, Dealer. I needed this.
I'm not out? My hand's good?
I knew I could do it.
I'm not losing this round!
I can't even begin to consider losing!
This hand is luckier than some magic items I've seen.
Huh? This hand is actually pretty good.
Just my luck.
I can taste victory here!
I'll never lose with a hand like this! Probably.
Prepare to lose
This round is mine!
I win this round.
Clearly my superior, strategic mind has allowed me to seize this opportunity.
Thanks for the winning hand, Dealer.
I've got this round won.
I've played enough poker mini-games to know a good hand when I see one.
I actually got a good hand?
Never underestimate my luck.
These are... OK, I guess...
I was hoping for better.
I thought my luck was better than this.
My luck's abnormally high, but it always turns out like this. Usually worse.
It could always be worse than this.
I want to complain, but I know I shouldn't.
If you've seen my party, you'd know I can work with disappointment.
I'll need to plan my next move carefully.
They aren't that bad...
What a downright unimpressive hand.
This hand better not bite me in the ass...
I've won more with less. I'll be fine.
These may not be great, but I can still win.
I won't lose to such a mediocre hand.
Mediocre. Just like my life.
My luck can make up for an average hand.
Just my luck.
This hand is dull.
My cards might get the job down or do me in. They remind me of a certain paladin.
I'm lucky enough to win with this average hand!
I'll make these work.
If I can make my party work, I can make this hand work.
I'd like better cards, but I won't complain.
So mediocre...
I can win with a hand like this, although others wouldn't be able to.
I can work with this. It's not the worst hand.
This might be a tough situation...
Oh. I was expecting worse.
With my luck, even an OK hand is better than your good one, ~Player~.
I've still got this won!
Not great, but I can still turn this around...
This hand would be a challenge for anyone but me.
It could be worse, I guess.
This hand's better than I thought it would be.
These cards aren't great...
Uh, This is a joke, right..?
Are you trying to screw me, dealer?
Really?
Is this just a joke to you, dealer?
As useless as Aqua.
I've got a good hand. Totally.
If bad poker hand's could cause physical pain, this one would be too much for Darkness...
And here I'd hoped my luck was actually gonna be good...
Oh. Wow. These are totally horrible.
I can't imagine someone having a worse hand than this, but it's my only hope right now...
Ha! These are- Ah! Horrible!
Isn't my luck supposed to be abnormally high or something..?
Great. I'm gonna lose. Like life hasn't kicked me around enough.
This is my gamer's intuition talking, I'm gonna lose.
What the hell even is this hand?
Dealer, I'm not afraid to use my magical power on you. Just so we're clear.
What the hell? Are you trying to make me lose, Dealer?
This hand is- horrible!
Looks like I'm about to lose here...
Will someone please have a worse hand than this...
This hand sucks...
Just my luck.
A hand that does nothing but weigh me down. Reminds me of a certain Arch Priest I know...
Is the dealer trying to get me to strip?
You have to be joking?
Stealth...
More bad luck. I can't catch a break.
This isn't how it was supposed to go...
Really? This is the best you'll give me?
I deserve better than this!
Good thing I don't have to win, just not lose.
Never underestimate my luck...
With a hand like this, you might see my dick!
Please let everyone else have worse hands. I want to keep my boxers on...
Please don't let this be my last round clothed.
Here's an idea. How about the loser has to do whatever I, I mean the winner, says?
Why do I have to strip with that mage here?
Don't get any ideas about anything, you Chuuni Mage.
I've won! Wait, what?
I hope this is a one-time fluke...
I'm glad my lead lasted so long...
I guess even my luck runs out eventually...
I know that perverted knight would be getting off to this...
Looks like I- LOSE?
But I was doing so well...
Right when I felt I was on the path to victory, I get dropped to the path of failure...
I can take a loss or two if I'm still leading.
It's not a major loss. You still won't see anything revealing.
Who has to strip? Wait, I do?
How is it I lose while winning?
I guess it's fine since I'm still in the lead...
Damn it. Just when things were looking good.
This is an impossible game.
Victory is mine! Wait, no it's not!
Damn. I'm still winning, at least...
But I was winning...
But I'm winning! This has to be a mistake!
Well this sucks.
So who has to strip? ME?
At least I'm still in the lead...
There goes my lead...
I hope this doesn't cost me my lead.
Always I'm in the lead...
As long as I'm in the lead, I'll be OK. Wait, what happened?
I-I'm still winning though...
It doesn't matter as long as I still can win...
I'll still be in the lead... I'll just be naked...
I've had higher stakes when gambling and came out on top. Why not now?
I was hoping to avoid this for a little longer.
Of course I don't have to strip, right? You're just joking right?
Really?
Why me? Why not someone else?
Of course. Just my luck.
It's not like I'll be losing much anyway.
This is such a minor setback that I'm not even gonna count my belt separately!
I lose. Great. It seems my in-game luck here is no better than it was back in the other world.
"What's wrong?" What do you mean, ~player~? I'm fine.
This is nothing to a seasoned adventurer like myself.
I guess I lose... Someone probably cheated...
And here I thought my luck was supposed to be good...
This game is rigged.
All my good fortune... Gone...
What? Why me?
So much for a good time...
I was hoping things would be different in this world.
With luck like this, I might as well have never left the other one...
Will I ever get a win..?
Every time I'm close to a win, something worse happens...
I can't believe I lost again...
I can't win at this game to save myself...
Someone must be cheating.
Everything about this sucks...
Oh joy. I lose. Again.
... Somebody must have been cheating...
Did somebody nullify my luck buff?
I really had hoped that it wouldn't come to this...
I-I'm not worried. I've fought through worse odds to win...
I really wish I was better equipped right about now...
Looks like I'm the wi- wait, what?
Isn't life with Aqua bad enough luck?
Dealer, I believe in equality. I don't care if you're male or female, I'm not afraid to dropkick you.
Screw you, dealer.
I didn't sign up for this part.
I can't seem to get a win...
Another loss..?
I'm so sick of losing...
What did I do to deserve this treatment?
It's not a major loss. I'll take it in stride because I'm a true heroic adventurer.
I could swear the dealer wants me to lose...
I just hope Aqua never hears about this. I'd never hear the end of it.
What? How Did I lose again?
At least I'm not losing any money this time...
I must be cursed. That's the only explanation.
How do I keep losing this bad?
That luck-buffing potion was a dud...
Why would my luck turn around now? It never does any other time.
Is it wrong that I'm getting used to being kicked around by life..?
Screw this impossible game!
This game is merciless!
Shouldn't this game have a comeback mechanic?
Why am I never allowed to enjoy nice things..?
Why does ~Player~ look so interested?
Pick on someone else for a change!
Sure. Keep kicking me when I'm down. I'm expecting it now.
Crap! What if this is just karma for all the times i used "Steal"?
I wonder if I could use "Stealth" here?
... There's no avoiding it, is there..?
I'll have to put all my hope on my next round if I wanna win...
Well, there was also that bath...
Well, there was also that bath...
Why am I even playing with 4 guys...
It's not over yet.
I don't care if I lose my cape...
As long as there's beautiful women here, I won't lose.
There are girls here from sources that even I don't know.
Do you think one loss will stop me?
I'm so confident that I'll win that I won't even count my belt as an individual item.
I'll take off my tunic, I guess...
It's just my tunic, don't get too excited...
This is exactly why I wore this outfit...
This isn't going like the practice games at all...
This type of situation is exactly why I didn't bring Chunchunmaru.
Despite my luck-buffing spell, I still lost.
I took a luck-enhancing potion that I bought from Wiz before playing. I want a refund.
Damn it. I left in such a hurry that I forgot to put on socks...
This damn game is impossible!
I wish I had more muscle definition right about now...
I guess I can lose the pants now...
The shut-in lifestyle really didn't do my body any favors...
I suppose it's less embarrassing to show off my boxers than my chest...
It feels just like unequipping my best gear in a MMO...
Here goes nothing...
It was so easy to do it at the mixed bath in Alcanretia. Why is it hard here?
This never happened in any of the games I played to prepare for this...
I've been seen in less by my party, but this is different somehow...
I never get this unlucky...
My party's seen me naked before, yeah. And some people in a mixed bath too, sure...
Don't call me a pervert. I'm not a masochist. I don't enjoy this type of thing.
This is humiliating...
That luck potion was a total bust. I'm definitely giving Wiz a piece of my mind.
That luck potion was a total failure. I'm gonna get Wiz back for this.
Don't call it that!
I'll still win just to be the best man here!
I'll never lose when I have the opportunity to see 2d waifus in 3d!
I have to win to see some naked girls!
Because in the end, all that matters is seeing beautiful girls naked!
Losing my cape won't stop me from winning against them!
This world is paradise! I'll lose a thousand times if it means getting to see beautiful women naked!
Couldn't we just play rock-paper-scissors instead?
I don't want to risk one of you people stealing my sword.
I'm gonna make sure to get a refund from Wiz for that...
Or maybe I should make her play this game as punishment. Yeah, that's a better idea.
Now I have one less layer to lose...
See? I'm still gonna win!
What do you mean I could have just lost my belt???
I should've taken the belt off separately....
My tracksuit is too valuable to risk in a game like this...
Maybe Wiz is just that bad at poker...
My legs look kind of wimpy as is.
That was the last thing I could spare. From here on, failure's not an option.
I'm not exactly the type of guy people usually fantasize about...
Not exactly a choice I was hoping to make...
By that, I mean I feel vulnerable and ridiculous.
I wish I had abs...
Maybe it's because I'm actually losing...
Has my good luck vanished or is Wiz just that bad at poker?
Maybe it's embarrassing because it's not on my own terms..?
Maybe I was cursed...
But this is different somehow...
Then why am I clearly aroused...
But oddly arousing...
Just not dressed like this...
Next time, she's gonna be naked in public. Mark my words.
Happy now?
Oh, you lose again, ~player~?
You know, you act like you're from another world yourself.
Thanks for taking the heat on this one, ~player~.
You look kind of embarrassed, ~player~.
If you think this is bad luck, try going on a quest with my party sometime.
You know, we're not so different, you and I.
Good loss, ~player~.
You're actually not that bad looking... For a guy, I mean.
So what world are you from, ~player~?
Why am I interested?
Traps don't count. Traps don't count.
I suppose I can make an exception for a trap or two...
Traps aren't gay. I'm straight as an arrow.
If he looks like a she then it's straight, right?
I suppose nobody I know has to know...
If I pretend I think you're a girl, then I don't have to face my feelings.
Oh. That guy's kinda not unhot.
Go ahead, ~name~.
I'd rather watch a cute girl strip.
You lose, ~name~! Which means I don't!
Any gullible fool who gets tricked has himself to blame.
You're lucky it isn't rock, paper, scissors or you would have lost far worse.
Oh. I totally thought I had lost.
A loss for you is a win for me, so I'm all for you losing.
Did I just level up?
It gets easier the more you do it. That's what I told my friend, Wiz, when we played a few practice games.
I'm sure there are girls going wild over this...
I guess you lose, which should be expected at this point.
As long as it's not me, I don't care who loses.
I'd really hate to be you right now.
It's just a game, don't take it so seriously.
I wonder how much EXP you just got me?
At least you can join me in embarrassment.
Good. I'm not out.
Your loss will not be in vain!
Always happy to see someone other than me lose for a change.
Nice play, ~name~. Totally didn't choke.
Thanks for taking the heat off of me.
Crap, ~name~ lost... I'm not into that...
I really wish I knew a spell to turn you into a cute girl right now.
Hah. You were clearly too intimidated by my presence to focus!
I keep my boxers on!
Thanks, ~name~. I can't take any more losses.
As long as it's not me, I'm good. I can't lose my boxers.
I don't really care right now...
This doesn't count as gay, does it?
You couldn't have done this earlier?
I couldn't care less right now...
Am I supposed to care?
Look, I'm not into you. Anything said during my, uh, forfeit is purely coincidence.
So what world are you from, beautiful?
Wow. You're pretty cute, ~player~. I hope you're more than a good body.
Yeah, your hot, but I hope you're not crazy, like some girls I know.
I wonder what ~player~'s butt looks like...
Let's hope you put on a show for us, ~player~.
You're kind of doing it for me...
You really aren't bad looking at all, ~name~. I'd like to see what you would do in my world.
I bet you'd be an asset to my party.
Oh, you lost again? How unfortunate. By the way, I've instructed the bartender not to serve you under any circumstances.
I wonder what everyone will say when I tell them you were playing such a lewd game all by yourself?
looks like you should've put some points into buffing spell instead of Explosion.
Without the hat, you look kind of like Yunyun...
You look kind of embarrassed to be barefoot in public...
I know how much you wear. I know what options you have left.
I could use Steal right now and nothing would change, you know that, right?
Oh? Looks like you lost. Now you have to undress, you know...
I'll have to thank Eris for allowing this to happen!
This is real... This is actually happening.
This is so much better than any dream a succubus could give me.
I'm the luckiest man alive!
This is my reward for all of my suffering!
Yeah! getting to see a girl strip is a reason to actually leave the house.
You may have heard some rumors about me being a pervert, a NEET, or other things like that. Trust me. They're not true.
Some people call me a pervert, but I'm just getting into the game. I'm totally never like this outside of here.
You know, I'm an experienced adventurer. I could get you a much cooler outfit. Of course it wouldn't cover much...
Your outfit is cool and all, but what bonuses does it give?
The entire reason I'm here is to see pretty girls strip!
I wonder just what you'll take off this time, ~name~.
Why don't you show us something naughty this time? Like maybe rip your clothes off instead?
You know, I do like seeing clothing damage, maybe I could help you out with my Tinder spell?
I wonder what I'd get if I used Steal right now..?
I'm waiting, ~name~...
I don't care what comes off as long as I see you strip!
You're not embarrassed, are you?
This is proof that somebody up there loves me... Hopefully Eris.
Don't forget, we're gonna be watching you strip, so try to add a little flair to it.
I never get to see hot girls strip with this little effort on my part!
You may be a loser, but at least you're cute.
Could you do me a favor and strip really slowly for me?
This is like one of those Breakout clones I used to play where you strip the girl with each block cleared!
Just because I'm in my underwear doesn't mean I'm not interested in seeing you strip.
Hey, it could be worse. Look at me.
Hopefully, you'll be forfeiting sooner than later.
I needed the inspiration anyway.
Go ahead, I'm watching...
So do you like me watching you like this?
Just because I'm out doesn't mean I won't enjoy this.
Winning would've been great, but seeing this is a prize in its own right.
Did you think I would lose interest just because I'm a bit spent? Give me a few minutes, then we'll talk.
Huh. Neat.
Is that even possible?
So does everyone have to strip now?
That's it?
Good enough.
I'm just glad not to lose.
I wonder if I could sell your ~clothing~...
Hey, better you than me.
I hope your spirit isn't broken.
You'll have to try a bit harder to defeat an experienced adventurer like me!
You could lose a lot more than your ~clothing~, ~name~. Trust me.
Your ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ just a minor accessory right? No enchantments?
I'm sure your ~clothing~ won't be missed.
Really? Just your ~clothing~?
So tell me, ~name~, are you from another world too?
Play lame, lose game, I guess.
That's a smart choice, but a dull one.
I'd be a lot more upset if you were a cute girl stalling her loss with low-risk items like your ~clothing~.
Look at me. Do you think you should be counting your ~clothing~?
I couldn't care less about your ~clothing~.
Just take off your ~clothing~ and hurry up.
That's cheating.
Really? Your ~clothing.ifPlural(count|counts)~?
Kind of a sore loser, aren't you?
I'm down to two layers and you're taking off your ~clothing~? I officially hate you.
What? I'm in my underwear and all you're losing is something that small?
Screw you and your ~clothing~.
I'm in my underwear here. Lose something better.
Can you take off something more that your ~clothing~? I mean, look at me.
Screw you, ~name~.
I'll take what I can get right about now.
Hey, at this point, I'll take anything.
I don't really care, I'm still in the game!
You've got to be freaking kidding me...
I hate this rigged game...
If you had played fairly, we'd be in the opposite positions right now...
Never mind that. Just thinking out loud.
a loss is a loss, I guess. No matter how small.
Just keep your head up. It makes losing easier.
Do me a favor and keep losing. I wanna win here.
Good job. A loss for you is a win for me.
If it makes you feel better, I know a goddess who has worse luck than you.
Say, how much is your ~clothing~ worth?
Guess I'll sleep.
Is... Is that allowed? Losing so little?
I feel bad for you, ~name~. Since, you know, I've not lost yet.
Huh. I expected more.
You know, some of the most broken magic items are mere accessories.
If you'd rather have a magical accessory than your ~clothing~, I could take you to Wiz's shop.
A play like that would get you laughed out of the guild hall.
How many accessories do you actually have? Looking at your outfit revealed so many potential accessories...
Really quick, how many tiny items do you have?
Good for you. Now let's move this along.
I can't believe your ~clothing.ifPlural(count|counts)~ as a layer...
Isn't there something more you could've taken off?
Kind of a bitch move...
Nobody cares about your ~clothing~!
Just hurry the hell up...
it's still a loss, I guess.
Hey. At least it wasn't me.
You suck, ~name~.
At least I didn't lose, I guess.
Couldn't you have lost something more..?
I'm in my underwear. Take off more.
as long as I'm still in the game, I'm good.
Normally, I'd hate this, but I'm desperate.
I'm still in this thing. I don't care about your ~clothing~.
Is that it? Coward.
I can't seem to find a single damn to give...
Nice play you're so good at this.
Honestly, I never expected to see you here, so I'm just gonna try to make the most of it by teasing you.
Just taking off your gloves? Yunyun was more adventurous when she played. Just saying.
Ha! Serves you right for ruining my awesome katana with that ridiculous name!
Just, y'know... less mature...
Ha! serves you ri-
So you're a real goddess, yeah? Like, you actually help people?
So you don't get to go on adventures often? Only your servants?
OK, hear me out. I have an adventurer's party with a useless goddess, OK?
Woah. Those look like high- class, legendaryequipment.
The eroge I played have prepared me for this.
It may not be much, but it's a start!
Seeing a beautiful girl strip is always good, even if it's something small.
I can't believe that I get to watch beautiful girls strip here. I never want to leave.
For once, I really have to be grateful.
This is looking good for me.
Just an accessory, sure, but it means you're losing another layer.
Oh? Just your ~clothing~?
With every item you strip off, I gain more EXP and the more EXP I get, the easier it is for me to win!
Does it matter if it's just your ~clothing~ as long as I get to see you strip?
Something small? you're such a tease...
I see you like teasing people. How lewd...
This teasing thing is painful, although I know someone who'd like it.
Are you trying to draw it out or trying to tease me?
Keep trying to draw this out, you'll still end up forfeiting in front of me.
Good enough for me right now.
Eh. Beggars can't be choosers.
You strip and I get to live another day. It's a win/win.
I guess it still counts...
It's a good thing you're hot or I'd be pissed off right now.
I like seeing girls strip and all, but your ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ a boring choice.
I hope I like what I see.
Let me see something good this time, ~name~.
So... You like stripping here, ~name~?
I mean, I like seeing you strip, but couldn't you have taken more off?
You lose. That means I win.
I can't help but think I'd enjoy this more if I wasn't in my boxers...
I don't really care how small your loss was now, I'm just enjoying the show.
Oh? You still have something that small?
Of course she still had something small to lose...
What's coming off this time?
You can do it, ~name~! I believe in you.
Just because I lost doesn't mean I'm not gonna have lewd thoughts about this.
But if you tell anyone back home about this, I'll leave you behind next time you cast Explosion.
Of course one could argue that you're playing smarter. One could. I won't.
No, I won't call it by that horrible name.
Stop trying to make me out into some sort of pervert!
Was that time magic?
It must be nice to have a useful goddess around... I know I'd love one.
Interesting... I think I have an idea...
I'll fire her and you can take her spot! You'll even get paid!
That looks even more high-class! You're totally kitted out!
So... do I get EXP when other people strip?
Something so small is a great way to tease people before something truly erotic.
... I really like the Inventory.
You can't win 'em all, ~name~. In fact, I'd like it if you didn't win at all.
She's a little bit cute...
As long as you're getting naked, I can forgive the lame choice.
Not to be a dick, but I figured you'd strip something more... important...
Please let that be her last accessory.
Teasing me like this is pretty good foreplay, ~name~.
Looking good, ~name~.
Being teased like this... I think I can finally understand that perverted knight...
I'd rather a pretty girl tease me sexually than get teased by a useless goddess.
Why not get rid of all your tiny items at once, ~name~?
So now that your ~clothing~ came off, how about no more accessories?
So now that that's out of the way, how about you just stop counting accessories as individual items?
Lookin' good, ~name~.
Screw your ~clothing~, you don't need it and I'm still in the game.
I can't be counted out yet, but your ~clothing~ can!
At least you're down a layer.
At least it's a pretty girl playing like a bitch.
Play lame, still lose game.
I'd be disappointed if it didn't mean you were closer to being totally naked.
I suppose it's OK to only lose your ~clothing~ since you're cute.
I'm surprised your ~clothing.ifPlural(count|counts)~ as a layer.
Good enough for me.
Yeah, this would be better if I was less exposed...
I like seeing you strip, even if it's something tiny like your ~clothing~.
It's not much, but I'll take it.
As long as something comes off, I don't mind.
It's not much, but it's enough for me to jerk it to.
I may have lost, but this is still a prize.
Keep this up and I may have to forfeit again.
You only lost an accessory, but that's a good thing. It's a tease. You have to appreciate the intricacies of games like this.
Huh. I don't really get why I'm liking this.
Another win for me!
Huh. I guess I don't really hate playing with another guy.
You do you, ~name~. I'll keep winning.
It must really suck to be you right now.
I'll be honest, I don't care about guys stripping.
Oh. You lost? Like a loser?
Yeah, whatever. Hurry up.
What an interesting loss. Not.
Oh joy. A stripping man.
I bet you're really glad we're not betting money, ~name~. I know I am.
Man, I wish I was watching a cute girl strip instead...
Huh. I think your ~clothing~ could sell for a fair sum.
Just hurry up so we can see someone sexy strip.
I'm not one watching guys strip, but I'm good with you losing instead of me.
I'm naked, and you're only losing your ~clothing~? Damn, This sucks.
Hey, good for me, bad for you, right?
You're down, but I'm not out!
No matter what you do, you're still just a guy getting naked.
I don't think I could possibly care less!
That's cool and all, but I'm not gay.
Good choice. You shouldn't really miss your ~clothing~.
You're loss is my gain, or lack of loss, I guess.
Nice! I didn't lose!
Sucks to be you right now.
Your ~clothing~ was expendable. Smart play.
Way to lose your ~clothing~ like the loser you are.
This game is getting gayer and gayer...
Stop enjoying this. Why is my dick betraying me?
I have no idea why I'm enjoying this...
Why couldn't you have lost a few rounds ago?
I'm out, yet this guy somehow gets to keep going... Just my luck.
